languages.text: "Я лишь следовала Завету Паутины. Ибо их время пришло, и Неумирающий протянул длань, чтобы принять их души".
"I was simply following the thread of the Web. For their time had come, and the Undying One reached out a hand to receive their souls."
languages.original_text: "Я лишь следовала Завету Паутины. Ибо их время пришло, и Неумирающий протянул длань, чтобы принять их души".

traits.locale_text: "I was only following the way of Ahn'shini. For their time had come, and the Undying One stretched out a hand to receive their souls."
"I was only following the way of Ahn'shini. For their time had come, and the Undying One stretched out a hand to receive their souls."
"I was simply following the way of Ahn'shini. For their time had come, and the Undying One reached out a hand to receive their souls."
"I was simply following the way of Ahn'shini. For their time had come, and the Undying One reached out a hand to receive their souls."
"I was simply following the thread of the Web. For their time had come, and the Undying One reached out a hand to receive their souls."
"I was simply following the thread of the Web. For their time had come, and the Undying One reached out a hand to receive their souls."

languages.text: «Solo estaba siguiendo el hilo de la Red. Había llegado su hora, y el Inmortal extendía Su mano para recibir sus almas».
languages.original_text: "I was simply following the thread of the Web. For their time had come, and the Undying One reached out a hand to receive their souls."

traits.locale_text: «Solo estaba siguiendo el hilo de la Red. Había llegado su hora, y el Inmortal extendía Su mano para recibir sus almas».

languages.text: 「私は、ただウェブの教義の道に従っているだけ。彼らの時が来て、不死の者がその魂を受け入れるべく、手を差し伸べられた」
languages.original_text: "I was simply following the thread of the Web. For their time had come, and the Undying One reached out a hand to receive their souls."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、ただウェブの教義の道に従っているだけ。彼らの時が来て、不死の者がその魂を受け入れるべく、手を差し伸べられた」

languages.text: “我仅仅是在遵循织血罗网的教义而已。他们的大限已经到来，不死之神伸出了手，接收他们的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "I was simply following the thread of the Web. For their time had come, and the Undying One reached out a hand to receive their souls."

traits.locale_text: “我仅仅是在遵循织血罗网的教义而已。他们的大限已经到来，不死之神伸出了手，接收他们的灵魂。”

languages.text: "Ich bin einfach dem Faden des Netzes gefolgt. Denn ihre Zeit war gekommen und der Todlose streckte seine Hand aus, um ihre Seelen zu empfangen."
languages.original_text: "I was simply following the thread of the Web. For their time had come, and the Undying One reached out a hand to receive their souls."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin einfach dem Faden des Netzes gefolgt. Denn ihre Zeit war gekommen und der Todlose streckte seine Hand aus, um ihre Seelen zu empfangen."

languages.text: « Je ne faisais que suivre les fils de la Toile. Car leur heure était venue, et l'Immortel a tendu la main pour s'emparer de leurs âmes. »
languages.original_text: "I was simply following the thread of the Web. For their time had come, and the Undying One reached out a hand to receive their souls."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne faisais que suivre les fils de la Toile. Car leur heure était venue, et l'Immortel a tendu la main pour s'emparer de leurs âmes. »

languages.text: "Yalnızca Ağ'ın ipliklerini takip ediyordum. Zira Ölmeyen'in ruhlarını almak için elini uzattığı vakit gelip çattı."
languages.original_text: "I was simply following the thread of the Web. For their time had come, and the Undying One reached out a hand to receive their souls."
